entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this morning then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. A few flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
